DefaultEvent.Description: Your child's eyes grow round as pennies. They store up the memories as dream-fuel. Much later, you find the scene you described, scrawled on a foolscap sheet by a childish hand...

ChildBranches.Name: Tell tales of far lands
ChildBranches.Description: There is something you saw, far across the black ocean. Share it.

DefaultEvent.Description: The zee-fog coils fat and white against the window. With a delighted shriek, your child disappears under the blanket.

ChildBranches.Name: Tell tales of the zee
ChildBranches.Description: You've come home safe, but you nearly didn't. Tell them how.

DefaultEvent.Description: Neither of them has ever seen the Surface; not yet -
DefaultEvent.Name: Someday

ChildBranches.Name: Tell your child and your sweetheart of the Surface
ChildBranches.Description: "The Sun is bright and cruel, and sweet as peaches..."

DefaultEvent.Description: Your child is disinclined to hug it; but its tank will take pride of place in their bedroom. Its staring eyes and pulsing fangs will inspire glorious fantasies of zee-monster hunting...
DefaultEvent.Name: Fear and wonder

ChildBranches.Name: Give your child a pet
ChildBranches.Description: It is remotely possible that it will escape and eat someone. Probably just the parlour-maid.

DefaultEvent.Description: Your child seems powerfully inclined to play with the Artefact. Perhaps it will break. Perhaps there's a jewel inside it, or a map, or a spirit. Perhaps it is edible. Perhaps you should employ a more vigilant nurse.
DefaultEvent.Name: Danger of breakage

ChildBranches.Name: Give them a souvenir
ChildBranches.Description: There's a space for it on that shelf, there.

DefaultEvent.Description: "One day," your child breathes - eyes wide and fixed, gleaming in the soul-light - "I will set this at the bow of my ship. I will sail east for always, until the sky goes out."
DefaultEvent.Name: Enchantment

ChildBranches.Name: Give your child a Judgements' Egg
ChildBranches.Description: It will coil and glow silently on their night-stand. It's a bit of a peculiar thing to give a child, honestly.

DefaultEvent.Description: Crumpets and bolete jam, and what happens when you spin a child round so fast they're very nearly sick. Quiet at evening's end; shared stories; bats beating at the windows. And much later, the warmth of renewed passion after the cold salt of the sea.

ChildBranches.Name: Just enjoy their company
ChildBranches.Description: An evening in the parlour with your child and your sweetheart. And so to bed.

Description:
It's a delight. But will it always be a delight? The zailor knows two worlds.
 [If you give suitable presents to your child, they will gain Sea Fever. If Sea Fever reaches 25, they will decide to run away to sea, becoming your Scion. This will establish a permanent dynasty of future zee-captains!]
Name: Time with your Family
